name: The Pessimist - kappa-63339
description:
One of ten in The Pessimist series. Generated by a hand-coded python application, it is the first objkt series minted by @TheMaxBore. The Pessimist series is built on an instruction set that combines rectangles, ellipses, clipping paths, and fills to create geometric, conceptual, modern works that are structured in their composition, but organic in their rendition. All quantities, sizes, positions, and pallets are generated by the application. kappa-63339 combines a bright pallet with a playful arrangement of shape and color, creating a piece that is airy and charming. The art exists as an svg to preserve the integrity of the original and allow viewing and reproduction at any size.

Generative art created by MaxBore.
Official wallet: maxbore.tez
Official Twitter account: https://twitter.com/themaxbore
